\usepackage{atbegshi}
\AtBeginShipout{%
  \setbox\AtBeginShipoutBox=\vbox{%
    \vbox to 0pt{%
      \kern-1.5in %
      \hbox to 0pt{%
        \kern-1.5in %
        \color{blue}%
        \rule{1in}{1in}%
        \hss
      }%
      \vss
    }%
    \hrule
    \hbox{\vrule\box\AtBeginShipoutBox\vrule}%

  }%
}

\@ifundefined{@EveryShipout@Init}{%
  \typeout{Test skipped}%
  \@@end
}{}
\@EveryShipout@Init
\let\@EveryShipout@Init\relax

    \rule{0mm}{\paperheight}%
    \hspace{.48\paperwidth}%

}
